data.title: How to write ''Taiwan'' in Chinese
data.meta_description:
Answer (1 of 9): It depends on which style of Chinese characters you’re using.

If you’re using simplified characters (common in mainland China and Singapore), it would be written 台湾.

Using traditional characters (typical of Taiwan and Hong Kong), you’d most commonly write it as 台灣. However, in ...
